text: Alleanza Securitas Esperia, also known as Allsecures, was an Italian insurance company. It was formed in Rome in 1933 by Amedeo Natoli with a merger of Alleanza & Unione Mediterranea with Securitas Esperia, a part of the Assicurazioni Generali group.Julie A. Mitchell (2001). Notable Corporate Chronologies: A-K. Detroit: Gale Group. . In 1965 it was the thirtieth Italian insurance company by total insurance premiums. It was merged into the AXA group in 1998.Roberto Baglioni, Guida agli archivi e alle fonti storiche delle assicurazioni in Italia, Marsilio, 2003Axa incorpora le società danni Uap e Allsecures, Milano Finanza, 1997 ==References== ==Other websites== * Milano Finanza, Axa incorpora le società danni Uap e Allsecures, 1997 Category:Companies of Italy Category:Insurance companies Category:1933 establishments in Europe
title: Alleanza Securitas Esperia
